boardgame.description: Blokus (officially pronounced _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Block us_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) is an abstract strategy game with transparent, Tetris-shaped, colored pieces that players are trying to play onto the board. The only caveat to placing a piece is that it may not lie adjacent to your other pieces, but instead must be placed touching at least one corner of your pieces already on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is a solitaire variation where one player tries to get rid of all the pieces in a single sitting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Blokus Game Board (400 squares)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;84 game pieces (four 21-piece sets of red, green, blue, and yellow)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each color inlcudes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 one-square piece_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 piece with 2 squares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 pieces with 3 squares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 pieces with 4 squares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 12 pieces with 5 squares_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Goal of the Game:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has to fit as many of his/her 21 pieces on the board as possible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;How to Play:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Each player chooses a color and places that set of 21 pieces in front of his/her side of the board. The order of play is as follows: blue, yellow, red, and then green._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. The first player (blue) places any of his/her pieces in a corner square. Play proceeds clockwise around the board (yellow, red, and green), each player putting their first piece down in one of the corner squares._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Play continues as each player lays down one piece during a turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each new piece must touch at least one other piece of the same color, but only at the corners._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;No flat edges of same color pieces can touch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are no restrictions on how pieces of different colors can touch one another._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4. Whenever a player is unable to place one of his/her remaining pieces on the board, that player must pass his/her turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;End of Game:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when all players are blocked from laying down any more of their pieces. This also includes any players who may have placed all of their pieces on the board. Scores are tallied, and the player with the highest score is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scoring:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player counts the number of unit squares in his/her remaining pieces (1 unit square = -1 point)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A player earns +15 points if all his/her pieces have been placed on the board plus 5 additional bonus points if the last piece placed on the board was the smallest piece (one square)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are unauthorized versions of the game published under various names, including The Strategy Game, Tetris, Blok_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;d (unofficial Hungarian version with cardboard pieces) and The Family Chess Game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally.

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. If you do not wish to use PayPal, you may pay me directly (via website or phone) using any major credit card. Shipping is $7.00 for UPS Ground to US locations (no PO Boxes, AK or HI). If you need a different type of shipping or any questions answered, please email before purchasing. CA orders pay 7.25% sales tax. For more info visit www.gamesinabox.com.
Opened but never played.

We are offering 1 unopened Blokus the Board Game.Blokus a strategy game played with colored shapes. Where you and your opponets try to cover as much of thr board in your own color as you can, while blocking each other from doing the same. This game is for 2-4 players aged 5 and up and lasts about 20-30 minutes per game. The game is factory sealed. The game is live and ready to ship. The winner will pay $10 for shipping and insurance. Shipping is $22 to AK or HI. We will accept paypal or money order for this auction. Please e-mail us with any questions or international shipping rates. Bid with confidence, our feedback is excellent.

never played +++++ german version, but game parts are completely language independent and you can download rules translations from boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save 30% or more off of every item we have listed on Boardgamegeek.com! Items are shipped within one or two business days upon reciept of payment (remember, money order, cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check or cash at your own risk!) If you do not wish to send payment and would rather pay us directly, you can give us a call at 816.554.7333 (Tuesday through Saturday) using Visa, Mastercard and American Express or by contacting us in order to make a Paypal payment (a 4.5% surcharge will be added to the total payment.) Shipping is based off of weight so it completely depends on the game(s) themselves though the average is $7 - $9.00 throughout the Continental US (and yes, we will combine on shipping!!!). If you need a specific type of shipping - such as Overnight or with Insurance - or have any questions, drop us an email. MO orders pay 7.35% sales tax. Also be sure to be on the lookout for PREORDER games being listed for the upcoming months! For more info about the store visit www.pfcomics.com (be sure to check out our forums for our weekly and monthly events).

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! If an item is bought and another edition was expected but you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ask, then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to refund but I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t cover either shipping charge.

Blokus. Strategy Game for the whole family. http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/2453/blokus Good 2 to 4 player abstract strategy game. Place your flat colored plastic tetris-like pieces on the game-board, but pieces of the same color can only touch at the corner. Player who places the most pieces (has the fewest pieces remaining) wins! Ages 5+, Players 2-4. New. No shrink wrap, but still sealed closed. Mattel 2009 Edition.
